exdesc:
"

Based on what you have seen in the tutorial above, you can see that this is something that is being done in a very professional manner. You can see that the thing that you input is going to be added to the page just like this. From what we have seen before, this is something that is completely new. Now, after all of this jibberish, let's solve the quiz:

  • Make a single list that contains 4 values.
  • Make another 3 lists with four values
  • Make a matrix (list of lists) containing all the values.
    Hint
